note:
Retired soldier, I spent about 30 years in the military (USMC/Army). Also recently retired computer systems engineer. So, I'm just plain retired. I need something to do so, I decided on photography and bird watching as a hobby. Unless otherwise stated, all photographs I post are my own.

I take pictures and want to share them with you, so please follow my blog.

#TheScienceofBirds
#birds #birdwatching #photography #photographer

This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

This is the official Mastodon account of the GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP).

GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, macOS, Windows and more operating systems. It is free software, you can change its source code and distribute your changes.

Whether you are a graphic designer, photographer, illustrator, or scientist, GIMP provides you with sophisticated tools to get your job done.
